description: Mobile techniques used by Phenakite, ATT&CK software S1126 (v1.0)
name: Phenakite (S1126)

techniques.comment: [Phenakite](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1126) can collect and exfiltrate WhatsApp media, photos and files with specific extensions, such as .pdf and .doc.(Citation: fb_arid_viper)
[Phenakite](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1126) has included exploits for jailbreaking infected devices.(Citation: fb_arid_viper)
[Phenakite](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1126) can download additional malware to the victim device.(Citation: fb_arid_viper)

[Phenakite](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1126) has used phishing sites for iCloud and Facebook if either of those were used for authentication during the chat sign up process.(Citation: fb_arid_viper)
[Phenakite](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1126) can masquerade as the chat application "Magic Smile."(Citation: fb_arid_viper)
[Phenakite](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1126) can exfiltrate the victim device’s contact list.(Citation: fb_arid_viper)
[Phenakite](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1126) can capture pictures and videos.(Citation: fb_arid_viper)
